com.example.stanza

Class AccountCommThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.example.stanza.AccountCommThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AccountCommThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is used to communicate with the backend server regarding accounts. Namely, it is used in conjunction with the LoginActivity, SignupActivity, and FriendBoardFragment to create accounts, authenticate accounts, and add friends.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        MAX_PRIORITY, MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY

    • Method Detail

      • thisAccount

        public void thisAccount(java.lang.String u,
                        java.lang.String e,
                        java.lang.String p)
        Adds an account to the account queue. Notifies the thread that it is time to work.
        Parameters:
        u - The username.
        e - The email.
        p - The password.

      • verifyAccount

        public boolean verifyAccount(Account account)
        Sends the account information to the backend server and receives verification of whether or nothis account exists. Called as part of the login process.
        Parameters:
        account - The account that is being verified. Specifically, does this email/password combination exist.
        Returns:
        True/false depending on whether or not the account exists.

      • addFriend

        public boolean addFriend(Account account)
        Sends account information to the backend server (containing the username of the friend) and receives verification of whether or not the friend's account exists.
        Parameters:
        account - An instance of Account containing the desired friend's username.
        Returns:
        True/false depending on whether the friend's account exists.

      • accountExists

        public boolean accountExists(Account account)
        Sends an account to the backend and receives verification of whether or not the account already exists. Used as part of the signup process.
        Parameters:
        account - An instance of account containing the account information for that account which the user is trying to create.
        Returns:
        True if the user can create the account with that username/email or false if the account is invalid (the username or email has already been taken).

      • run

        public void run()
        Takes care of all communication with the backend when there is an account in the accounts queue. Utitlizes the task_id that has been defined in the constructors to determine which task is currently being handled--creating an account, authenticating an account, or adding a friend. Sends a message to the backend telling it which task is being performed. Then sends the account information to the backend. Finally, it receives a true/false validation regarding the success of the task and informs the proper activity.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
